Remote Site Search:E
Only target friendly provinces :1
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster bestows the knowledge of the gnomes upon himself and uses it to find places of Earth power. The spell will find all magic Earth sites in a friendly province of the caster's choice.
